sentences.english: He chuckled slightly and blushed. "Yeah, that was my girl."
sentences.chinese: 他脸红地轻声笑了，“是的，那是我的女儿。”

sentences.english: Don't mind them, she whispers to the child.
sentences.chinese: 别理他们，她轻声对孩子说。

sentences.english: We could hear the pot bubbling (away) quietly on the fire.
sentences.chinese: 我们能听见壶里的水在火上轻声地沸腾着。

sentences.english: Be strong and confident and learn to speak softly.
sentences.chinese: 要坚强，有自信，并且学会轻声细语的说话。

sentences.english: Kurt quietly sang along with Glen.
sentences.chinese: 库尔特轻声地随着格伦一起哼唱。

sentences.english: He threw away the last line.
sentences.chinese: 他把最后一句台词轻声带过。

sentences.english: This is what I see, I tell him silently.
sentences.chinese: 我轻声的告诉他，这就是我所看到的。

sentences.english: "I asked Net to make a stop at little Company, " she said quietly.
sentences.chinese: “我让耐特在附属公司停一下，”她轻声地说。

sentences.english: Waters glanced at the chronometer and whispered, Sir, thirteen minutes to go.
sentences.chinese: 沃特斯盯着计时器轻声说，长官，十三分钟过去了。

sentences.english: He breathed words of love into her ear.
sentences.chinese: 他轻声在她耳畔倾吐爱恋之言。

sentences.english: Will the clerk quietly say, "Yes, sir, " and go to the task?
sentences.chinese: 那个职员会轻声说“好的，先生”，然后就去执行吗？

sentences.english: Rubin, like most engineers, is usually soft-spoken.
sentences.chinese: 和大多数工程师一样，鲁宾通常轻声细语。

sentences.english: The lush trailing grapevines are always humming along.
sentences.chinese: 青翠蔓延的葡萄藤总是轻声吟唱。

definition: in a low voice/(speak) in whispers
to talk to oneself/to think aloud/to soliloquize
to have a smile on one's face
